paper.title: The Empirical Study of Chinese Mutual Funds' Evaluation System Building
paper.abstract: This paper built a Chinese mutual funds' evaluation system through three parts, including the investment return factors, risk factors and the mutual fund managers' investment management capabilities, of 10 multi-indictors to associated with our financial circumstance. And then we used principal components analysis to extract principle factors from these 10 multi-factors to construct a system in order to ranking 50 sample funds comprehensively. Compared with the third rating agencies' rating system, this system is more understandable and useful, especially suit for the ordinary investors.

domain_result.justification: 该论文构建了一个中国共同基金的评估系统，涉及投资回报因素、风险因素和基金经理的投资管理能力，这些都是投资组合管理的核心内容。论文还使用了主成分分析来提取主要因素并构建排名系统，这进一步支持了其在投资组合管理领域的应用。
